comments: Pela is used mainly as debuffer so you should focus on EHR and Speed first then build some defensive stats on her.
substats: Effect Hit Rate until 67% > Effect RES until 30% (if running Broken Keel) > Speed > HP% = DEF%. Can also build Crit at E6
traces_priority: The Secret Strategy (A4) > Bash (A2) = Wipe Out (A6)
name: Debuffer
